title: Dragonslayer Pantheon Bug
body: So, I'm still unsure as to why no one has said anything about this yet, but um, when dragonslayer pantheon ults, in many cases as soon as you see the red ring around you, pantheon drops. You don't get anytime to get out of the way.  This is only a problem specific to the dragonslayer pantheon skin.

replies.body: Well im not the only one who's seen it. I've had teammates in games and other friends tell me the same thing.

Dragonslayer pantheon is the only pantheon I play, but This has never happened when I ulted with him. Is your RADS glitched? I know sometimes the RADS on a persons client will become glitchy and give you unfair, (or your enemy) advantages. My brother once had his so glitchy that on twisted treeline he could momentarily see someone hiding in a bush if they had just entered it.
Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on!
